name: Rage Quit Racer
description:
Gravity is your enemy, falling at extreme speed from a great height, down transport tunnels full of dangerous obstacles and the only escape is to reach the end, what can you do? Not to worry, the tunnel will provide all you need to survive the deadly drop.

Fun and addicting 3D racing / runner game featuring adrenaline pumping extreme speed single and online multiplayer.

Features include:

+ Addictive twitch style game play
+ Retro 3D arcade look and feel
+ Compete against others world wide to get the best scores and times
+ Race friends and family in online multiplayer
+ Record your games and share the madness with friends (iOS 9 only)
+ Vertical racing, because horizontal has been done to death
+ Tilt or touch to steer
+ Earn achievements
+ Awesome music
+ 8 different tunnels to run and race
+ Nitro boosters to give you the edge
+ Collect bravery coins to spend on new tunnels and the lucky shields powerup
+ No in-app purchasing

What other players are saying

"Great game... reminds of total Wipeout back in the day."
"SPEEEEEEEEEED! as addictive as Super Hexagon and just as mesmerising"
"It reminds me of Super Hexagon and the Death Star scene in Star Wars. Very cool"
"This is a great addition to the tunnel racing genre, super smooth controls and very addictive!"
"Brilliant game, would definitely recommend giving it a go..."
